name: NPM package.json
description: Package manifest file for Node.JS modules. Note that this is incomplete. http://npmjs.org/doc/json.html

filename.description: This makes the correct path on the cdn.

name.description: The name and version together form an identifier that is assumed to be completely unique.

version.description: Version must be parseable by node-semver, which is bundled with npm as a dependency.
